CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( Is_Escapes__c , show_as_escape__c ,INCLUDES( deal_type__c , 'stay'),INCLUDES( deal_type_nz__c , 'stay') ),
(HYPERLINK( IF ($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", "/lightning/r/00O0K00000AkVIu/view?fv0=", "/00O0K00000AkVIu?pv0=") & Name, Deal_ID_Title__c &" Escape Nights Sold/Hold Report")),
"Report Not Available for this Deal")
CustomField.label: BDM Escape Nights Sold Report
